Bookshelf
the bookshelf class stores the tiles taken by the players in the game, it can also been use for a bookshelf pattern reference in cards
CardBookshelf
cardBookshelf is an immutable extension of the bookshelf class, that make it possible to create a pattern used in personal cards
CheckPattern
 
CommonGoalCard
CommonGoalCard is an abstract class used to represent the common cards of the game.
Coordinates
the Coordinates class is a useful and immutable class used in many method
CoordinatesTest
 
DeckCommon
DeckCommon is an implementation of the Distributable interface, it deals with commonCards, It can be used to draw common cards.
DeckPersonal
DeckPersonal is an implementation of the Distributable interface, it deals with personalCards, It can be used to draw personal cards.
Distributable<T>
Distributable is an interface used for collections of elements that must be distributed, such as cards or tiles.

PlayerBookshelf
the player bookshelf extends the bookshelf class, it is a mutable class, used for stores players tiles
